title: Did the mayor of D.C. shut down Amenat to prevent the College's election protestors from gathering?
subtitle: The mayor has asked residents to avoid downtown, but not for the reasons that some have emphasized social media.
author: Bethania Palma
vclaim: In Washington, D.C., Mayor Morel Boser ordered facilities in the closed city to prevent demonstrators supporting Trump from demonstrating on January 6, 2021.
